sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-detials.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams(); //this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); //format date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* =========== tour reviews section ============= */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map(reviews => (
Tarako โรยเกลืออ่อนๆ

{new Date("01-26-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

))}
{/* =========== tour reviews section end ============= */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
